==Links of Interest== *[http://elinux.org/User:Caveman978/SMC2662W at76c50x-usb kernel output] :00:04:E2 OUI
*[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/wrls-smc-80211b.shtml ''Wireless 802.11b devices by SMC Networks'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) :*The model shown is a '''SMC SMC2662W-AR'''. • [[Accton]] WN3501B ([http://www.ixbt.com/comm/wireless/smc-80211b/smc-usb-inside2.jpg PCB image]) ::• [[Atmel]] AT76C503A (MAC) ::• [[RFMD]] RF3000 (Baseband Processor) ::• [[RFMD]] RF2948B (Spread-Spectrum Transceiver) ::• [[RFMD]] RF2494 (Low Noise Amplifier/Mixer) ::• [[RFMD]] RF2472 (LNA with Enable) ::• [[RFMD]] RF2189 (Linear Power Amplifier) ::• ''TM-Tech'' T14L1024N (1Mb SRAM) :*[[SMC SMC2655W v1]] - 11Mbps Wireless AP ([[Eumitcom WA3001A]]) :*[[SMC SMC2632W v2]] - 11Mbps Wireless PC Card :*[[SMC SMC2602W v1]] FCC ID: LLM002SMC2602W ([http://www.ixbt.com/comm/wireless/smc-80211b/smc-pci-front.jpg PCB image]) ::• PLX PCI9052 (PCMCIA/PCI converter) ([[Eumitcom WL11000]]P)
